/** * Returns a substitution matrix for {@link AminoAcidCompound amino acids} given by the name {@code name}. * Searches first in the default AAINDEX file (see @link {@link #getMatrixFromAAINDEX(String)}), then in the classpath * in src/main/resources/matrices. * Example names: *
    *
  • blosum62
    • *
  • JOND920103
    • *
  • pam250
    • *
  • gonnet250
    • *
* @param name Either a common name or an AAINDEX name * @return a {@code} SubstitutionMatrix {@code} or {@code}null{@code} if no matrix is found */
